metadata.Title: CVE-2017-7264 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Use-after-free vulnerability in the fz_subsample_pixmap function in fitz/pixmap.c in Artifex Software, Inc. MuPDF 1.10a allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted document.

criterions.comment: mupdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
